java/liquibase/ClassLoaderFileOpener.java

00001 package liquibase;
00002 
00003 import java.io.IOException;
00004 import java.io.InputStream;
00005 import java.net.URL;
00006 import java.util.Enumeration;
00007 
00013 public class ClassLoaderFileOpener implements FileOpener {
00014     public InputStream getResourceAsStream(String file) throws IOException {
00015         return getClass().getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream(file);
00016     }
00017 
00018     public Enumeration<URL> getResources(String packageName) throws IOException {
00019         return getClass().getClassLoader().getResources(packageName);
00020     }
00021 
00022     public ClassLoader toClassLoader() {
00023         return getClass().getClassLoader();
00024     }
00025 }
